name: necon1bi
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wn(wceq(c0, c1)), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wn(wceq(c0, c1)), w0)

stmt.pretty: sylbir(¬ c0 = c1, w0, c0 ≠ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wceq(c0, c1)), w0)
-| wb(wne(c0, c1), wn(wceq(c0, c1)))
-| wi(wne(c0, c1), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wceq(c0, c1))
-| wb(wne(c0, c1), wn(wceq(c0, c1)))
-| wi(wne(c0, c1), w0)

|- wi(wn(w0), wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wne(c0, c1), w0)

comment: Contrapositive inference for inequality. (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2007.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 22-Nov-2019.)
